meanings.definition: The state or fact of not being used.
meanings.sent1: The nonuses of the old tools were evident in the dusty workshop.
meanings.sent2: The nonuses of the extra chairs were noticeable in the empty room.
meanings.sent3: The nonuses of the broken umbrella became apparent when it started raining.
meanings.sent4: The nonuses of the forgotten memories lingered in the back of her mind.
meanings.sent5: The nonuses of the abandoned toys filled the attic with a sense of neglect.

meanings.definition: The act or process of not using something.
meanings.sent1: She regretted the nonuses of her talents when the opportunity passed.
meanings.sent2: The nonuses of the expired coupons were disappointing.
meanings.sent3: The nonuses of the unread books piled up on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: The nonuses of the idle machinery echoed through the factory.
meanings.sent5: The nonuses of the untouched paint tubes saddened the artist.

meanings.sent1: The nonuses of the neglected garden were evident in the overgrown plants.
meanings.sent2: The nonuses of the abandoned building were a waste of space.
meanings.sent3: The nonuses of the outdated technology were apparent in the office.
meanings.sent4: The nonuses of the untouched ingredients led to a bland meal.
meanings.sent5: The nonuses of the neglected skills hindered his career growth.
